EN: What do you call someone who raises hens? A chicken tender.
ES: ¿Cómo se llama a quien cría gallinas? Un pollero.

EN: Some cheeses are safe for lactose-intolerant people to eat... but only once
ES: Algunos quesos son seguros para el consumo de personas intolerantes a la lactosa.

EN: In 1840 Queen Victoria received a half-ton wheel of cheddar cheese as a wedding gift.
ES: En 1840 la reina Victoria recibió una rueda de queso cheddar de media tonelada como regalo de bodas.

EN: It takes about 10 pounds of milk to make just 1 pound of cheese...It's basically milk.zip
ES: Se necesitan aproximadamente 10 libras de leche para hacer solo 1 libra de queso.

EN: Why are shopping centers boring? Because if you've seen one you've seen the mall.
ES: Algunos quesos son ilegales en Estados Unidos

EN: Did you hear about the magician who was driving down the street? He turned into a parking lot.
ES: Una ley de Wisconsin exigía que los restaurantes sirvieran queso con cada comida.

EN: Why didn't the chef season his dish? He ran out of thyme.
ES: Comer queso 30 minutos antes de acostarse ayuda a dormir mejor

EN: Have you ever heard of “quiet tennis?” It's the same as regular tennis but without the racket.
ES: La mozzarella es el queso más popular en Estados Unidos.

EN: What did the duck say to the waiter when he brought the check? “Just put it on my bill.”
ES: El queso y el vino son la combinación perfecta

EN: Why did the guy get fired from the calendar factory? He took a day off.
ES: La mayoría de los quesos se elaboran con sólo tres ingredientes.
